original_text: For his sins which he sinned in doing evil in the sight of the Lord, in walking in the way of Jeroboam, and in his sin which he did, to make Israel to sin.
korean_text: 이는 그가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 범죄하였기 때문이니라 그가 여로보암의 길로 행하며 그가 이스라엘에게 죄를 범하게 한 그 죄 중에 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: For his sins which he sinned
in doing evil in the sight of the Lord
in walking in the way of Jeroboam
and in his sin which he did

sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘로 하여금 죄를 짓게 하려 함이라
